data.name: 公交码
data.title: 湖北 i武汉-公交码(需要无障碍)
data.path: [{"item":{"appId":"gh_ef33e6cd1cc9","iconPath":"","id":0,"name":"i武汉","path":"","subName":"","type":1}},{"item":{"appId":"","dlType":-2,"iconPath":"","name":"公交码","path":"[{\"actionType\":2,\"delay\":0,\"param1\":\"个人中心\",\"param2\":\"乘车码\",\"timeout\":25000,\"type\":0},{\"actionType\":2,\"delay\":2000,\"param1\":\"公交码\",\"timeout\":15000,\"type\":0}]","subName":"","type":5}}]

data.name: dump小程序
data.path: original_string=$(dumpsys shortcut -p com.tencent.mm| grep com.tencent.mm.action.WX_SHORTCUT); ext_info=$(echo "$original_string" | sed -n 's/.*ext_info=\([^,]*\).*/\1/p'); id=$(echo "$original_string" | sed -n 's/.*id=\([^,]*\).*/\1/p'); token=$(echo "$original_string" | sed -n 's/.*token=\([^,]*\).*/\1/p'); result="#Intent;action=com.tencent.mm.action.WX_SHORTCUT;i.type=1;S.ext_info=$ext_info;S.id=$id;S.token=$token;end"; echo $result
data.title: 获取桌面小程序参数

data.name: 一键通话
data.path: [{"item":{"appId":"com.tencent.mm","iconPath":"","name":"视频","param1":"{\"action\":\"com.tencent.mm.ui.ShortCutDispatchAction\",\"category\":\"\",\"data\":\"\",\"extras\":[{\"key\":\"LauncherUI.Shortcut.LaunchType\",\"type\":\"--es\",\"value\":\"launch_type_voip\"}]}","path":"com.tencent.mm.ui.LauncherUI","subName":"语音通话可把下方的Extras改为launch_type_voip_audio","type":0}},{"item":{"iconPath":"android.resource://com.syyf.quickpay/drawable/ic_warning","name":"进去改名字","path":"[{\"actionType\":2,\"delay\":1000,\"param1\":\"在微信添加星标，然后这里写对方的昵称(无障碍容易掉权限，建议到[更多设置]激活自动打开无障碍)\",\"timeout\":8000,\"type\":0}]","subName":"","type":5}}]
data.title: 微信一键通话(无障碍,需修改配置)
